\subsection{Class network}

    \label{initialize_system:No_hop_Network:network}
Class for building initial state of No\_hop system

    \label{initialize_system:No_hop_Network:network:generate_random_keys}
    \index{initialize\_system \textit{(package)}!initialize\_system.No\_hop\_Network \textit{(module)}!initialize\_system.No\_hop\_Network.network \textit{(class)}!initialize\_system.No\_hop\_Network.network.generate\_random\_keys \textit{(method)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{generate\_random\_keys}(\textit{self}, \textit{amount}={\tt 8})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
    Generates {\textless}amount{\textgreater} many keys randomly between 
    the values of 0 and {\textless}network.max\_id{\textgreater} with a 
    distance between ids of atleast 2 returns a sorted list.

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{initialize_system:No_hop_Network:network:define_ports}
    \index{initialize\_system \textit{(package)}!initialize\_system.No\_hop\_Network \textit{(module)}!initialize\_system.No\_hop\_Network.network \textit{(class)}!initialize\_system.No\_hop\_Network.network.define\_ports \textit{(method)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{define\_ports}(\textit{self})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
    Assign each connection network ports and set corresponding port as 
    taken in corresponding port lists/dicts

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{initialize_system:No_hop_Network:network:draw_network}

    \label{initialize_system:No_hop_Network:network:make_new_folder}
    \index{initialize\_system \textit{(package)}!initialize\_system.No\_hop\_Network \textit{(module)}!initialize\_system.No\_hop\_Network.network \textit{(class)}!initialize\_system.No\_hop\_Network.network.make\_new\_folder \textit{(method)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{make\_new\_folder}(\textit{self}, \textit{folder\_name}={\tt 0})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
    Builds empty folder with unused name or rewrites build folder if 
    rewrite\_build\_folders==1

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{initialize_system:No_hop_Network:network:find_reachables}
    \index{initialize\_system \textit{(package)}!initialize\_system.No\_hop\_Network \textit{(module)}!initialize\_system.No\_hop\_Network.network \textit{(class)}!initialize\_system.No\_hop\_Network.network.find\_reachables \textit{(method)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{find\_reachables}(\textit{self})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
    Finds the reachable ranges for switches if only traversing the tree 
    downwards returns labels, weights. labels a printable version, weights 
    the cleaned ranges.

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{initialize_system:No_hop_Network:network:clean_ranges}
    \index{initialize\_system \textit{(package)}!initialize\_system.No\_hop\_Network \textit{(module)}!initialize\_system.No\_hop\_Network.network \textit{(class)}!initialize\_system.No\_hop\_Network.network.clean\_ranges \textit{(method)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{clean\_ranges}(\textit{self}, \textit{ranges})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
    Takes switch many dict of ranges and cleans each list of ranges to be 
    represented in the minimal amount of ranges. returns labels(dict), 
    weights(dict). labels a printable version, weights the cleaned ranges.

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{initialize_system:No_hop_Network:network:host_range}
    \index{initialize\_system \textit{(package)}!initialize\_system.No\_hop\_Network \textit{(module)}!initialize\_system.No\_hop\_Network.network \textit{(class)}!initialize\_system.No\_hop\_Network.network.host\_range \textit{(method)}}

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
    Find the range id host is respondible for.

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}
